synonyms: rādhikādye—in Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī and the other gopīs; pūrva-rāga—feelings before union; prasiddha—celebrated; pravāsa māne—also pravāsa and māna; prema-vaicittya—feelings of fear of separation; śrī-daśame—in the Tenth Canto; mahiṣī-gaṇe—among the queens.
translation: "Of the four kinds of separation, three [pūrva-rāga, pravāsa and māna] are celebrated in Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī and the gopīs. In Dvārakā, among the queens, feelings of prema-vaicittya are very prominent.
